en: Welcome to the open data portal searcher
This tool can now search these open data portals
Put your search term in here. Example : economy

There is a lot of open data portals in the world and if we want to look for data we have to go to those sites one by one and look individually.
This tool is a proof-of-concept open data portal searcher web application for open data portals in Indonesia that aims to create a simple and lightweight interface that can search all open data portals using their APIs.
In doing so it want to help encourage people in learning how to work with data by enabling them to easily find the data that they wanted from various open data portals.
This tool is created with the support of School of Data
Data Portal Sheet ID (put 0 if first sheet)
ID Sheet Data Portal (put 0 if first sheet)

Example config file : Hello !
Welcome to the Open Data Searcher Configuration Page !
In order to make this tool work you will need to enter 4 configurations that refers to a Google spreadsheet sheet.
Please check the help file here for instructions
